entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 12 this evening. Forecast issued 6:24 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 1. Forecast issued 6:24 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:24 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
